page.title: 17A CLASS SURVEY
page.content: {WORK} The majority of parents work; in most households 2 people work. Most work in Northampton, only 2 work in Heyford. 5 are engineers. Only 2 people are self- employed. Many people go to work by car and they take about 20 minutes to get to work. A few people, occasionally, travel longer distances to work. {LEISURE} Many hobbies are outdoor, including 4 gardeners. Sports of all kinds are very popular. Most people go to Northampton to enjoy their leisure; a few go to Daventry or Silverstone. They all have local club memberships. {SHOPPING} Most people get all of their shopping on Thursday, Friday and Saturday in Northampton, they use the supermarkets and the open market. There are a few who shop in Nether Heyford & Daventry.
